title: Musekinin Kanchou Tylor (1995) (Dub)
alternative_title: Irresponsible Captain Tylor OVA; 無責任艦長タイラー OVA; 無責任艦長タイラー(1995); Musekinin Kanchou Tylor OVA
description: Many years ago, Azalyn's best friend in all the universe was a similar aged boy named Ruu. Also royalty of a sort, they shared the way that children do and both pledged that one day they would rule fairly. Both also agreed that one day they would meet again. Also included on this disc are stories featuring Yamamoto: the action hero, Kojirou - testing a prototype fighter, Andresen - evaluating the newest Marine Battlesuit, and "White Christmas", where it's Christmas, Yuriko is waiting andTylor is late.
genre: [<Genre -> Adventure>, <Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> Drama>, <Genre -> Mystery>, <Genre -> Sci-Fi>, <Genre -> Space>]
